title: Proof Attempt
description: A proof attempt of a theorem

iri.description: The unique identifier for the proof attempt

number.description: The number of this proof attempt in relation to the theorem

used_prover.description: The name of the prover used during this attempt

time_taken.description: The time it took to perform this proof attempt (in seconds)

evaluation_state.description: The current state of the proof evaluation

used_axioms.description: Reference to all axioms used for this attempt

used_theorems.description: Reference to all theorems used for this attempt

generated_axioms.description: Reference to all axioms generated during this attempt
